Canadian Government Tender Announcement
----------------------------------------------------------------------
### Tender Details
#### Title
Ergonomic Rotary Chairs for RCMP
#### Reference Number
PW-22-01017245
#### Tender Closing Date
2023-01-27T17:00:00
#### Solicitation Number
M2989-2-0236/A
#### Amendment Number
3
#### Status
Expired

#### Need
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting bids for the delivery and installation of ergonomic rotary chairs for use in office settings. The chairs are to be purchased and delivered to Chilliwack, British Columbia, by March 24th, 2023.

#### Requirement Details
- Product Category: Rotary Chairs and Stools
- Quantity: As per tender specifications
- Geographic Location: Chilliwack, British Columbia

#### Eligible Suppliers
- Suppliers must be pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement
- Non-supply arrangement (Non-SA) holders may submit a bid to the Identified User, but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation

#### Trade Agreements
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Tender Documents
The following documents are available for download: 
[link to downloaded documents]

#### Contact Information
Inquiries regarding this tender should be directed to Kathleen Nillas at kathleen.nillas@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Note**: 
- The procurement process is subject to the rules and regulations of the Trade Agreement
- The RCMP reserves the right to delay the award of a resulting contract pending the evaluation of an arrangement and issuance of a supply arrangement by the Supply Arrangement Authority
